metadata.title: Britain charges 2 Russians over Novichok poisoning | Fox News
metadata.description: British officials announced Wednesday that they have charged two Russian men with the nerve agent poisoning of ex-spy Sergei Skripal and his daughter Yulia in the English city of Salisbury — though they held out little hope of being able to bring them to justice.

metadata.title: 2 Russians charged over Novichok poisoning of ex-spy, used fake perfume bottle, British officials say | Fox News

metadata.title: Myanmar official says 'totally underestimated' economic impact of Rohingya crisis | Reuters
metadata.description: A Myanmar foreign investment official said on Wednesday he "totally underestimated" the economic damage of the Rohingya crisis, adding that the outcry over the jailing of two Reuters reporters would also have some impact on his country's reputation.

metadata.title: Britain charges Russian men in Salisbury Novichok nerve agent murder attempt on Sergei Skripal and daughter Yulia - CBS News
metadata.description: Russian nationals Alexander Petrov and Ruslan Boshirov, face charges in absentia over attempted murder of Russian double agent, daughter and cop
metadata.keywords: novichok, Alexander Petrov, Sergei Skripal, russia, Salisbury, murder, World, Assassination, spy poisoning, Ruslan Boshirov

nodes.title: UK Prime Minister: Nerve-agent poisoning suspects were Russian agents

metadata.title: UK charges 2 Russians over Novichok poisoning; suspects were agents
metadata.description: The suspects, Alexander Petrov and Ruslan Boshirov, charged in absentia with conspiracy to murder, attempted murder and use of nerve agent Novichok.
metadata.twitterTitle: UK Prime Minister: Nerve-agent poisoning suspects were Russian agents
